fields.title: Davey Jones Pirate Christmas
fields.author: Davey Jones
fields.ingredients: ["A pint of Grog", "2 Scallywags", "One parrot, lightly scalded", "A hook hand"]
fields.method: ["Drink the grog", "Roast the parrot", "Dance drunkenly with the scallywags"]

fields.title: Mulled Wine
fields.description: This traditional homemade mulled wine recipe is incredibly easy to make and always SO cozy and delicious.
fields.author: Diana Boley
fields.ingredients: ["Red Wine", "Brandy", "Oranges", "Cinnamon", "Cloves", "Star Anise", "Sugar or sweetener of your choice"]
fields.method: ["Combine all ingredients in a saucepan", "Give the mixture a quick stir.", "Heat the saucepan until the mixture is almost bubbling", "Turn the heat to low", "Cover the saucepan and simmer for 3 hours", "Use a strainer to remove all of the flavourings", "Add sugar or sweetener to taste", "Serve warm in heatproof mugs"]

fields.title: Gingerbread Men cookies
fields.description: A popular and simple recipe for gingerbread cookies - crisp at the edges and soft in the middle
fields.ingredients: ["145g of unsalted butter", "150g of brown sugar", "1 large egg", "1 teaspoon of vanilla extract", "438g of all purpose flour", "1 teaspoon of baking soda", "1/2 teaspoon of salt", "1 tablespoon of ground ginger", "1 tablespoon of ground cinnamon", "1/2 teaspoon of ground allspice", "1/2 teaspoon of ground cloves", "360g Confectioners' sugar", "5 tablespoons Water", "1/2 teaspoon Vanilla extract", "2 teaspoons Corn syrup", "A pinch of salt", "Icing piping bag", "160ml of maple syrup"]
fields.method: ["Using a hand mixer, beat the butter until smooth", "Add brown sugar and maple syrup", "Beat the mixture until creamy", "Beat in the egg and vanilla extract for 2 minutes", "In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, salt, ginger, cinnamon, allspice and cloves", "On low speed, mix in the first mixture", "Split the dough in half and wrap each half in plastic wrap", "Flatten each dough package into a disc", "Chill dough discs for a minimum of 3 hours", "Pre-heat an oven to 180C and line 2 to 3 baking trays with baking parchment", "Remove the chilled dough discs and flour a work surface", "Roll out the dough until it is 1/4 inch thick", "Cut the dough into shapes and place them on the baking parchment", "Bake the cookies for 10 minutes", "Remove the cookies and allow to cool", "For the icing, stir the confectioners' sugar, vanilla extract, corn syrup and water into a bowl", "Mix until the mixture sticks to the whisk for a few secondss to the whisk", "Add food colouring if desired", "Add the icing to a piping bag, and decorate the cookies as desired"]

fields.title: Eggnog
fields.author: Elise Bauer
fields.ingredients: ["6 large egg yolks", "150g of sugar", "500ml of milk", "2 whole cloves", "A pinch of cinnamon", "200ml of heavy cream", "1 teaspoon of ground nutmeg", "1 1/2 teaspoons of vanilla extract", "Bourbon, to taste", "Rum, to taste"]
fields.method: ["In a bowl, use a whisk to beat the egg yolks until they become lighter", "Slowly add the sugar, and then beat until fluffy", "In a saucepan, heat the milk, cloves and cinnamon until hot", "Add the eggs to the hot milk", "Cook the eggnog on a medium heat until the mixture thickens slightly", "Remove from the heat and stir in the cream", "Strain the mixture through a mesh strainer, and allow to cool", "Stir in the vanilla extract, nutmeg, bourbon and rum"]

fields.title: Christmas dinner sausage rolls
fields.description: Combine the best bits of a Christmas dinner in one moreish bite with these canap√©s. Ideal for a festive buffet
fields.author: Cassie Best
fields.ingredients: ["375g of ready rolled puff pastry", "2 heaped tablespoons of cranberry sauce", "200g of turkey thigh mince", "50g of dried stuffing mix", "6 chipolatas", "1 egg, beaten", "16 sage leaves", "Gravy"]
fields.method: ["Heat an oven to 200C,180C fan", "Line a baking tray with baking parchment", "Unroll the pastry and cut in half lengthways", "Spread the cranberry sauce down the middle of each half, leaving a 2cm border", "Combine the mince and stuffing with 1 tablespoon of water, then season to taste. Spread the mixture over the cranberry sauce", "Line the chhipolatas across the middle of each pastry half", "Brush some egg along one edge of the pastry half, then fold up and over the filling, then press to make 2 long sausage rolls", "Cut both rolls into 8 pieces each", "Brush each sausage roll with egg, and place a sage leaf on top of each roll", "Bake for 25 to 30 minutes, and serve warm with gravy"]

fields.title: Danish flaeskesteg
fields.description: A Danish take on a roast pork joint
fields.ingredients: ["2kg pork loin with the skin on", "1 carrot, chopped", "1 onion, diced", "A bay leaf", "500ml of boiling water", "Sprigs of thyme"]
fields.method: ["Pre-heat the oven to 250C", "Place the pork joint skin side down into a roasting tray", "Add boiling water to the tray so that the skin is submerged", "Cook the pork joint for 20 minutes", "Remove the baking tray and carefully pour away the water", "Turn the oven down to 160C", "Flip the pork joint over so that it is skin up", "Coat the skin with a large measure of salt and pepper, and the bay leaves", "Add the carrot, onions and thyme to the baking tray", "Pour 500mL fresh cold water into the baking tray", "Cook the pork for a further 1 hour", "Use a meat thermometer to measure the inside temperature of the joint. It should be 68 - 70C", "Pour out the fatty residue into a bowl to use as a base for a gravy", "Increase the oven temperature to 250C and cook the pork further for 15 minutes to make the crackling", "Remove the pork and test the temperature again. It should be between 70-75C", "Let the pork rest for 10 minutes. Meanwhile, make the gravy from the fat and stock"]

fields.title: Vegan Christmas cake
fields.description: The vegan take on a Christmas classic
fields.author: Sophie Godwin
fields.ingredients: ["1kg of mixed fruits - raisins, sultanas, currants, cherries, cranberries, prunes, figs", "1 orange - zested and juiced", "1 lemon - zested and juiced", "150ml of run", "250g of coconut oil", "200g of brown sugar", "4 teaspoons of chia seeds", "175g of plain flour", "100g if ground almonds", "Half teaspoon of baking powder", "2 teaspoons of mixed spice", "1 teaspoon of ground cinnamon", "1/4 teaspoon ground cloves", "100g flaked almonds", "1 tsp vanilla extract"]
fields.method: ["Place dried fruit, zests and juices, rum, coconut oil and sugar into a large pan over a medium heat", "Mix well, bring to the boil, lower the heat and simmer until the sugar has dissolved", "Move the mixture to a large bowl and cool for 30 mins", "Heat the oven to 150C/130C fan. Line a 20cm deep cake tin with baking parchment", "Mix the chia seeds with water. Leave to sit for 5 minutes until gel-like and thick", "Add remaining ingredients to fruit mixture along with the chia seed mixture and stir well", "Tip this mixture into a prepared tin, level with a spoon and bake for 2 hours", "Remove the cake from the oven, use a skewer to pole holes in it, and spoon over 2 tablespoons of rum", "Peel off the baking parchment, and feed the cake with 2 tablespoons of alcohol every fortnight until ready to ice"]

fields.title: Christmas fudge
fields.description: Festive fudge with an orange zest, dried fruit and spices
fields.author: BBC Good Food
fields.ingredients: ["450g of golden caster sugar", "400g of double cream", "50g of butter", "1 tablespoon of glucose syrup", "1 tablespoon of vanilla bean paste", "1/2 teaspoon of mixed spice", "100g of mixed dried fruit and peel", "1 orange, zested"]
fields.method: ["Line a 20x20cm cake tin with baking parchment", "Mix the sugar, cream, butter and glucose syrup into a large pan. Warm over a low heat and stir to dissolve", "Bring the syrup to the boil. Use a thermometer to measure the temperature. When it reaches 116C, remove the heat", "Leave the mixture for 5 minutes, then mix in the vanilla bean paste, mixed spice, mixed dried fruit and peel, orange zest and a pinch of salt", "Beat the mixture vigourously until the temperature reaches 60C", "Pour the fudge mixture into the tin and smooth over with a spatula and leave to cool", "Cut into bite sized pieces"]

fields.title: Christmas crinkle cookies
fields.description: Festive crinkle cookies with a classic fudgy centre
fields.author: Liberty Mendez
fields.ingredients: ["60g cocoa powder", "200 caster sugar", "60mL vegetable oil", "2 large eggs", "180g plain flour", "1 teaspoon baking powder", "2 oranges, zested", "2 teaspoons mixed spice", "1 teaspoon cinnamon", "50g icing sugar"]
fields.method: ["Mix the cocoa, caster sugar and oil. Add the eggs one by one, whisking until fully combined", "Combine the flour, baking powder and salt in a bowl, then add the cocoa mixture and mix until a soft dough forms", "Heat the oven to 190C, 170C fan", "Tip the icing sugar into a shallow dish", "Roll balls of the dough in the icing sugar", "Place the balls onto baking trays with baking parchment", "Bake for 10 minutes and then cool on a wire rack"]

fields.title: Christmas punch
fields.description: A festive blend of booze with clementine and giner
fields.author: Mirian Nice
fields.ingredients: ["A bunch of red grapes", "750mL prosecco", "1L of cloudy apple juice", "Ice", "250mL sloe gin", "50mL herbal liqueur", "1 ball of stem ginger", "2 tablespoons of stem ginger syrup", "4 sprigs of rosemary", "1 clementine, finely sliced"]
fields.method: ["Freeze the grapes for 8 to 12 hours. Chill the prosecco and apple juice", "Put the grapes and a large handful of ice in a large punch bowl", "Pour the remaining ingredients on top", "Stir gently to combine and then serve"]

fields.title: Christmas sticky toffee pudding
fields.description: Traditional Christmas pudding with a sticky toffee sauce
fields.author: Anna Glover
fields.ingredients: ["250g of dates, chopped", "100g of raisins", "200mL of spiced rum", "150g of butter", "50g muscovado sugar", "3 large eggs, beaten", "375g self raising flour", "1/2 teaspoon mixed spice", "1 teaspoon ground cinnamon", "50mL milk", "Vanilla custard or ice cream, to serve", "75g of muscovado sugar", "2 tablespoons of treacle", "2 tablespoons golden syrup", "75g of butter", "150mL double cream"]
fields.method: ["Put the dates, raisins and 100mL of water in a small saucepan and set over a low heat for 5 minutes", "Put the 75g of sugar, treacle, golden syrup, 75g of butter into a pan", "Bring the pan to a simmer for 5 minutes, then add the double cream. Cook for another 2 minutes. Remove from the heat and allow to cool", "Butter a 1.5L pudding basin", "Beat the butter and sugar in a large bowl. Add the eggs one by one, mixing well", "Fold in the flour, spices, fruit and milk", "Pour a quarter of the toffee sauce into the basin, then spoon in the sponge", "Cover the pudding basin with baking parchment and then foil", "Steam the pudding in a steamer for 2.5 hours", "Check the sponge is ready by inserting a skewer. If the skewer comes out clean, it is ready", "To serve, invert the sponge onto a plate, warm the sauce and serve with custard or ice cream"]

fields.title: Christmas nachos
fields.description: A clever way to use up leftovers
fields.author: Cassie Best
fields.ingredients: ["1 red onion, sliced", "1 lime, juiced", "Sugar", "4 sausages", "6 rashers of bacon", "200g of totrilla chips", "200g of cooked turkey or chicken", "100g of cranberry sauce", "150g of melty cheese", "1 teaspoon of olive oil", "Sage leaves"]
fields.method: ["Mix the onion, lime juice, sugar and a pinch of salt in a small bowl. Set aside", "Heat the grill to a medium-high. Line a baking tray with foil", "Make small meatballs from the sausages. Grill for 10 minutes", "Grill the bacon until crisp, and remove from the grill pan", "Set the oven to 200C/180C fan", "Spread half of the tortilla chips on the grill pan", "Top with half of the meatballls, half of the chicken or turkey, half the cheese and some cranberry sauce", "Scatter the remaining ingredients on top and bake for 15 minutes", "Heat the oil in a pan and fry the sage leaves", "Serve the nachos with the red onions, sage leaves, and bacon"]

fields.title: Christmas pudding vodka
fields.author: Miriam Nice
fields.ingredients: ["300g of currants", "100 sultanas", "50g prunes", "50g glace cherries", "1 orange, zested", "1 lemon, zested", "150g brown sugar", "1/2 teaspoon mixed spice", "1 cinnamon stick", "1 vanilla pod, centre split", "1 litre of vodka", "25mL of brandy", "25mL of amaretto"]
fields.method: ["Put the dried fruit, citrus zests, sugar, spices and vanilla into a 1.5L preserving jar", "Add half the vodka to the jar", "Seal the jar, and shake", "Add the remaining vodka, brandy and amaretto", "Store and shake daily for 2 to 3 weeks. Strain the vodka with coffee filter", "Preserve the soaked fruit for other dishes"]

fields.title: Christmas dinner Wellington
fields.description: A different take on the main dish of a Christmas dinner
fields.author: Cassie Best
fields.ingredients: ["1 tablespoon of oil", "1 onion, chopped", "6 chicken breasts", "400g sausagemeat", "Rosemary, thyme and sage, chopped", "100g fresh breadcrumbs", "10 slices parma ham or prosciutto", "250g cranberry sauce", "2x500g blocks of puff pastry", "Plain flour", "1 egg, and 1 yolk"]
fields.method: ["In a pan, fry the onion until soft", "On a chopping board, spread the chicken between two layers of cling film. Gently bash the chicken breasts until they are 1/2 cm thick", "Mix the sausagemeat, herbs and breadcrumbs into the cooked onions", "Lay a 30x40cm of cling film on a work surface, and cover with ham or prosciutto", "Completely cover the ham with the chicken breasts. Season the chicken", "Cover the chicken with the sausagemeat mixture", "Cover the sausagemeat with cranberry sauce", "Roll the layered meats along the long edge, encasing within a spiral", "Wrap the spiral in cling film and freeze for 30 minutes", "Roll out one block of pastry on a floured surface to a thickness of 3mm. Place on a baking tray lined with baking parchment", "Unwrap the meat spiral and place it on top of the pastry", "Roll out the second block of pastry. Whisk together the egg and extra yolk and brush along the edge of the pastry base", "Drape the second sheet of pastry over the meat, moulding it rightly around the meat", "Crimp the border to seal the two sheets together. Brush the wellington with the egg wash", "Cover and chill the wellington for up to 2 days", "Heat the oven to 200C/180C, and cook for 1 hr 15 minutes", "Serve with mashed or roast potatoes, veg and gravy"]

fields.title: Christmas Pudding Cheesecake
fields.description: A delicious cross between a cheesecake and a Christmas pudding
fields.author: Tom Kerridge
fields.ingredients: ["200g of ginger biscuits, crushed", "30g muscovado sugar", "1 teaspoon sea salt", "110g unsalted butter, melted", "240g Christmas pudding", "30mL brandy", "30mL stout", "1 orange, zested", "560g cream cheese", "300mL double cream", "200g muscovado sugar", "2 vanilla pods"]
fields.method: ["Mix the gingernuts,  30 g of sugar and salt in a large bowl. Pour in the melted butter and mix", "Press the mixture into a 20cm round cake tin. Chill for 30 minutes", "Blend the Christmas pudding, brandy, stout and orange zest  into a puree", "Beat the cream cheese with the double cream, sugar and vanilla seeds, then fold in the puree", "Spread the mixture over the biscuit base and chill overnight", "Release the cheesecake from the tin and serve"]
